summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3778 for the improvement of Bright Street, from 6th Avenue Northwest to Leary Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers, and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 46515, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
